scripts.api_build: cd udagram-api && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.api_test: cd udagram-api && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.api_deploy: cd udagram-api && npm run deploy && cd ..
scripts.frontend_build: cd udagram-frontend && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.frontend_test: cd udagram-frontend && npm run test && cd ..
scripts.frontend_deploy: cd udagram-frontend && npm run deploy && cd ..
